tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We had a very pleasant experience with Dr.Hiral Shah and her staff. My Son was very anxious about the appointment and any procedure, but She was very patient with him and the staff was very helpful and kind. Dr.Hiral Shah is very professional and reasonably priced. She takes the time to explain what needs to be done and provides valuable advice. Itâ€™s rare to find a doctor that combines such personal touches and care for a patient as a person with outstanding quality of medical care. It's not easy to find a good dentist for your kids. I feel I received honest advice and trusted my dentist's opinion here. I am so glad I chose Hello!Tooth and would highly recommend to anyone.

review: Dr Hiral is a good friend of my son .Very few Drs are good in counseling and patient friendly Dr Hiral is amongst them, who has created her name by mouth publicity. Dr is such hardworking and always available incase of emergency. Thank you Dr Hiral for all support and so caring, loving.
